us:descriptions.us:description: It the path from the entity to the scope can be described by XPath, this type can be used.
It the path from the entity to the scope can be described by XPath, this type can be used.

This can be used of no path is available from the entity to the scope by XPath. If a unique path can be created from the scope to a connecting entity, this connection entity needs to be described from the entity side by XPath and from the scope entity by JPQL.

This can be used of no path is available from the entity to the scope by XPath. If a unique path can be created from the scope to a connecting entity, this connection entity needs to be described from the entity side by XPath and from the scope entity by JPQL.
